\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 98673}

\subsection*{Pretty Rad}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{m}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   &  & Pharms - Methylphenidate & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 104.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Today I scored some Ritalin. I heard the effects are almost the same as coke or any other upper. I had one pill at 1 in the afternoon and felt almost nothing until now at 5 in the evening. 



It's definitely not what I expected. It slows everything down, except my thoughts. I can feel me feet buzzing and my legs tingling and my face flushing as this sweet tickle of euphoria sweeps over me. 



I really don't feel like I'm high on cocaine, I feel almost like I'm high on weed, but not as paranoid or distracted. I can tell that this is going to last for a while, and I keep feeling higher and higher. I really feel at peace with life and really connected to my emotions.

\end{document}
